          <title>
            <string language="en">Gases in the Earth's atmosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase in der Atmosphäre der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz dans l'atmosphère de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gáses na atmosfera da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas nell'atmosfera della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέρια στη γήινη ατμόσφαιρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gases en la atmósfera de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart shows the percentages of component gases making up the Earth's atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argon</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm zeigt die Prozentsätze der 
Teilgase, die herauf die Atmosphäre der Masse bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire montre les 
pourcentages des gaz composants faisant vers le haut de l'atmosphère 
de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta mostra as porcentagens dos 
gáses componentes que fazem acima da atmosfera da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta mostra le percentuali 
dei gas componenti che fanno sull'atmosfera della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει τα ποσοστά των 
συστατικών αερίων που αποτελούν τη γήινη ατμόσφαιρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada muestra los porcentajes de
los gases componentes que hacen encima de la atmósfera de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
